mapper.select: select a.* from (tpm_project)a,(select * from tpm_project_member where member_idx=#{member_idx})b where a.project_idx=b.project_idx

select * from (tpm_category)c,(tpm_work)w,(tpm_checklist)ch where project_idx=#{project_idx} and w.category_idx=c.category_idx and w.work_idx=ch.work_idx order by c.category_idx,w.work_idx,ch.checklist_idx
